title: Email with attachment does not appear in Thunderbird
content: My wife sent me an email with a small word file to my Yahoo and I see the email when I log into Yahoo but not Thunderbird. I have always been able to receive emails with attachments before so don't know what to do. I'd be fine if I saw the email without the attachment but no email shows up at all in Thunderbird, only Yahoo email.
creator: jamesvelasquez1
